name: Dice Scravenger
description:
Dice Scravenger Roll dice to defeat enemies!

Use the dice rolled each turn to either protect yourself, or attack the oncoming enemies.

Drag and drop the dice to the attack slots (above the enemy) to attack, or to the block slots (above you) to block incoming damage.

You can see what you enemy is about to do by looking at Intent Indicator (next to their health). Use this information to plan your moves and beat the enemies before they beat you!

Once all enemies have been defeated (there are 3), they come back with a vengeance, this time dealing more damage! Fight off enemies for as long as you can.

If you like this game, please feel free to try some of my other games, follow me on Twitter, or visit my website.
